About me

I'm a 25-year-old software engineer from Rome with a strong passion for technology, psychology and neuroscience.

I'm currently working as a Solution Engineer at Octostar, building the future of AI-powered investigation.

I dove into web development 5 years ago, dreaming to make people's lives easier thanks to sophisticated and user-friendly products.

Music is another passion of mine, you can check out my Last.fm profile to see what I love and what I'm listening to.
